acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Louisa County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Louisa was formed in 1742 from Hanover County.
The will books of Louisa in this collection were created by the County Court.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will Books, 1746-1902, of Louisa County Court. The will book includes the name of testator, list of heirs and the year the wills were proven in court and probate records such as inventories and appraisements. The will books have indexes which contains the first and last names of both parties. It is arranged alphabetically from A-Z. Will Book (1757-1902) is not fully proven.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Louisa Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records On Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia web site.
